item.title: About
item.description: Hello and welcome to my blog My name is Georgi Bojinov, you will see me mostly as Nimor on the internet. I am a programmer by degree (computer science) and by passion. I currently work as a Scala developer at Ocado Technology. I also have experience with Python and Node.js, and a bit of Golang. I enjoy functional programming immensely. Also, I like the Nix package manager. I like exploring new languages and technologies, but at the end of the day getting things done is my top priority.
